headline: Norfolk Southern expands short line interchange improvement program
summary: After small railroad volume growth outperformed the Class I, Norfolk Southern is expanding an interchange program to more than 260 shortline partners. The post Norfolk Southern expands short line interchange improvement program appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: Norfolk Southern expands short line interchange improvement program
raw.summary: After small railroad volume growth outperformed the Class I, Norfolk Southern is expanding an interchange program to more than 260 shortline partners. The post Norfolk Southern expands short line interchange improvement program appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC) Up 5.7% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: Norfolk Southern (NSC) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: Transportation and Logistics Stocks Q1 Highlights: Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC)
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how transportation and logistics stocks fared in Q1, starting with Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC).
